Feature Notes:
Alchemist Tool Proficiency: Tool Proficiency (Alchemist's Supplies)
Armor Model: 1 selection
Armor Modifications: Can have 2 additional infusions placed on armor
Artificer Specialist: 1 selection
Artillerist Tool Proficiency: Tool Proficiency (Woodcarver's Tools)
Battle Ready: Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons)
Battle Smith Tool Proficiency: Tool Proficiency (Smith's Tools)
Infuse Item: 12 selections
Tools Of The Trade: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)/Tool Proficiency (Smith's Tools)
Armor Model: Can change selection after a rest
By Popular Demand: Can receive welcome and lodging in exchange for performing
Darkvision: R60' Sees one light level better
Flash Of Genius: R30' Can use a reaction to give an ally +3 on an ability check or save 3 times per long rest
Spell-Refueling Ring: Infused ring allows recovery of a level 3 spell once per day
Spell-Storing Item: After a long rest, can store in an item an A1 or A2 spell that can be cast 6 times
The Right Tool For The Job: Can spend 1 hr to create a set of artisan's tools
Skill Proficiency: Acrobatics; Deception; Investigation; Nature; Performance; Persuasion; Sleight Of Hand; Stealth

Skilled: Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from any)
Actor: Has advantage on Deception and Performance to impersonate another person and can mimic others' speech or sounds
Dampening Field: Armor gives advantage on Stealth
Tool Expertise: +6 with proficient tools
Combat
Hit Points: 86 Initiative: 7 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 3
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Breastplate Shield: None Weapons: Javelin (+7 1d6+1 R30/120); Light Crossbow (+8 1d8+2 R80/320); Sling (+8 1d4+2 R30/120); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Explosive Cannon: Eldritch Cannon inflicts +1d8 HP damage
Extra Attack: +2 Attacks Per Round
Improved Defender: Arcane Jolt inflicts +2d6 HP or restores +2d6 hit points, and Steel Defender gains +2 Armor Class
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Alert: Cannot be surprised, and unseen foes gain no advantage on attacks on self
Arcane Armor: Self armor has no Strength requirement, covers the entire body, replaces missing limbs, cannot be unwillingly removed, and can be put on or taken off in 1 action
Arcane Jolt: Magic weapon or Steel Defender attack inflicts +4d6 HP force or restores 4d6 hit points to 1 target in a 30' radius 3 times per long rest
Battle Ready: +2 (Intelligence instead of Strength) or +1 (Intelligence instead of Dexterity) attack and damage with magic weapons
Defensive Field: Can use a bonus action to gain 20 temporary hit points 6 times per long rest
Eldritch Cannon: Can create a magical cannon (Armor Class 18, 100 hit points (Mending repairs 2d6 hit points), can move 15') flamethrower (15' cone inflicts 3d8 HP fire (save DC 17 Dexterity half)), force ballista (R120' inflicts 3d8 force and pushes 5'), or protector (R10' targets gain 1d8+3 temporary hit points) for 1 hr once per long rest; can spend spell slots to create additional cannons
Explosive Cannon: R60' Can destroy an eldritch cannon to inflict 3d8 HP force (save DC 17 Dexterity half) in a 20' radius
Fortified Position: Can have 2 Eldritch Cannons simultaneously, and Eldritch Cannons give allies in a 10' radius half cover
Improved Defender: Steel Defender Deflect Attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP force
Lightning Launcher: Range 90/300 attack inflicts 1d6 HP lightning, +1d6 HP lightning once per rd
Perfected Armor (Guardian Armor): R30' Can use a reaction to pull a Huge or smaller creature up to 30' (save DC 17 Strength negates) and attack if within 5' afterward 6 times per long rest
Perfected Armor (Infiltrator Armor): Lightning Launcher inflicts disadvantage on attacks on self for 1 rd, and the next attack on the target within 1 rd gains advantage and inflicts +1d6 HP lightning
Soul Of Artifice: Can use a reaction and end 1 infusion when reduced to 0 hit points to retain 1 hit point
Steel Defender: Can create a mechanical companion (Armor Class 17; 105 hit points (Mending repairs 2d6 hit points and can self-repair 2d8+6 hit points 3 times per day); +9 attack inflicts 1d8+6 HP force; can use a reaction to inflict disadvantage on attack in a 5' radius; can move 40'; Dexterity Save +7; Constitution Save +8; immune to poison and charmed, exhausted, poisoned, and surprised conditions)
Thunder Gauntlets: Each gauntlet inflicts 1d8 HP thunder and disadvatage on attacks on others for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Intelligence
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 7; Dexterity: 2; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 4
Save Notes:
Chemical Mastery: Has resistance to acid and poison damage and immunity to the poisoned condition
Fey Ancestry: Has advantage vs. charm and immunity to magical sleep
Soul Of Artifice: +1 per attunement on saves
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 4; A1: 4; A2: 3; A3: 3; A4: 3; A5: 2; D0: 2; D1: 1 Attack: A: 9; D: 10 Spell DC: A: 17; D: 18
Spells:
Aura Of Purity (A4 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and advantage on saves vs. conditions for concentration up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (A3 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Banishing Smite (A5 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for concentration up to 1 min if the attack reduces the target below 51 hit points
Blight (A4 [Alchemist Spells] Necr): R30' Inflicts 8d8 HP necrotic (save Constitution half; plant target has disadvantage on the save and suffers maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Branding Smite (A2 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights the target for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Cloudkill (A5 [Alchemist Spells] Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (save Constitution half) and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (A5 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Conjure Barrage (A3 [Battle Smith Spells] Conj): 60' cone inflicts 3d8 HP weapon type damage (save Dexterity half)
Death Ward (A4 [Alchemist Spells] Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives the next death effect within 8 hrs
Fire Shield (A4 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): Self gains resistance to a choice of heat or cold damage, and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fire Shield (A4 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): Self gains resistance to a choice of heat or cold damage, and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fireball (A3 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Flaming Sphere (A2 [Alchemist Spells] Conj): R60' 5' sphere lights a 20' radius, inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half), ignites unattended flammable objects, and can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Gaseous Form (A3 [Alchemist Spells] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous, gaining a 10' fly Speed and advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, for concentration up to 1 hr
Greater Invisibility (A4 [Armorer Spells] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 min
Greater Restoration (A5 [Chemical Mastery] Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, cursed, or ability damage or regains hit point maximum
Heal (A6 [Chemical Mastery] Evoc): R60' Target regains 70 hit points and recovers from blinded, deafened, and diseased [+Level restores +10 hit points]
Healing Word (A1 [Alchemist Spells] Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+3 hit points [+Level restores +1d4 hit points]
Heroism (A1 [Battle Smith Spells] Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +3 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hypnotic Pattern (A3 [Armorer Spells] Illu): R120' Creatures in a 30' cube become incapacitated (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min; taking damage ends the effects
Ice Storm (A4 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (save Dexterity half) and becomes difficult terrain for 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Lesser Restoration (A2 [Restorative Reagents] Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Lightning Bolt (A3 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): 100'x5' line inflicts 8d6 HP lightning (save Dexterity half) and ignites unattended flammable objects [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Magic Missile (A1 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Mass Cure Wounds (A5 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): R60' 6 targets in a 30' radius regain 3d8+3 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Mass Healing Word (A3 [Alchemist Spells] Evoc): R60' 6 targets regain 1d4+3 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Melf's Acid Arrow (A2 [Alchemist Spells] Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 4d4 HP acid, plus 2d4 HP the following rd (miss half initial HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d4 HP initial and secondary]
Mirror Image (A2 [Armorer Spells] Illu): 3 duplicates (AC 12; damage destroys) allow misdirecting attacks on self for 1 min with an 11, 8, or 6 on a d20 while 1, 2, or 3 duplicates remain
Passwall (A5 [Armorer Spells] Tran): R30' Creates a 5'x8'x20' passage through wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr
Raise Dead (A5 [Alchemist Spells] Necr): Restores life with 1 hit point to and removes nonmagical diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse; target suffers -4 attacks, saves, and ability checks, reduced by 1 for each long rest
Ray Of Sickness (A1 [Alchemist Spells] Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned for 1 rd (save Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Scorching Ray (A2 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Shatter (A2 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (save Constitution half; inorganic creatures have disadvantage) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Shatter (A2 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (save Constitution half; inorganic creatures have disadvantage) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Shield (A1 [Artillerist Spells] Abju): Reaction gives +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until the next turn
Shield (A1 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): Reaction gives +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until the next turn
Thunderwave (A1 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Thunderwave (A1 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Fire (A4 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Force (A5 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for concentration up to 10 min
Wall Of Force (A5 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for concentration up to 10 min
Warding Bond (A2 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): Touched gains +1 AC, +1 saves, and resistance to all damage while within 60' of self, and any damage to the target also affects self, for 1 hr
Wind Wall (A3 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' Creates a 50'x15'x1' area that inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (save Strength half) and deflects lightweight creatures and objects for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 druid cantrips and can cast a chosen D1 spell once per long rest
Magic Item Master: Can attune 6 items simultaneously
Magic Item Savant: Can attune 5 items simultaneously and ignore attunement and use requirements on attuned items
Alchemical Savant: Spells cast using alchemical supplies inflict +3 HP acid, fire, necrotic, or poison or restore an equal number of additional hit points
Arcane Firearm: Spells cast through a prepared wand, staff, or rod inflict +1d8 HP
Arcane Propulsion Armor: Infused armor gives +5' Speed, cannot be removed unwillingly, and replaces missing limbs; range 20/60 magical gauntlets inflict 1d8 HP force, then return
Armor Modifications: Can apply individual infusions to armor chest, boots, helmet, and weapon
Armor Of Magical Strength: Wearer of infused armor with 6 charges can spend 1 charge to gain +Intelligence Modifier on a Strength check or save, or to use a reaction to avoid being knocked prone; the armor regains 1d6 charges each dawn
Boots Of The Winding Path: Wearer of infused boots can use a bonus action to teleport back to a space within 15'
Chemical Mastery: Can use alchemist's supplies to cast Greater Restoration and Heal once per long rest
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells that inflict cold damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Enhanced Arcane Focus: Infused rod, staff, or wand gives +2 spell attacks that ignore half cover
Enhanced Defense: Infused armor or shield gives +2 Armor Class
Enhanced Weapon: Infused weapon gives +2 attack and damage
Experimental Elixir: Can use alchemist's supplies after a long rest to create 3 elixirs of healing, swiftness, resilience, boldness, flight, or transformation; can spend spell slots to create additional elixirs
Helm Of Awareness: Infused helmet gives advantage on initiative, and the wearer cannot be surprised
Homunculus Servant: Can create a mechanical companion (Armor Class 13; 24 hit points; R30' +9 attack inflicts 1d4+6 HP force; Evasion; Channel Magic)
Infuse Item: Can infuse 8 items simultaneously
Magic Item Adept: Can attune 6 items simultaneously and craft uncommon magic items in 1/4 time at 1/2 cost
Magical Tinkering: Can imbue 3 objects simultaneously to emit light, a message, sound, an odor, or a picture
Mind Sharpener: Infused armor or robes with 4 charges allows the wearer to use a reaction and 1 charge to change a spell concentration roll from failure to success; the item regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Radiant Weapon: Infused weapon with 4 charges gives +1 attack and damage and emits a 30' bright light on command; the wielder can use a reaction and 1 charge to blind a successful attacker (save DC 17 Constitution negates) for 1 rd; the weapon regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Repeating Shot: Infused ammunition weapon gives +1 attack and damage and automatically creates its own ammunition
Replicate Magic Item: Can replicate a chosen wondrous item
Repulsion Shield: Infused shield with 4 charges gives +1 Armor Class; the holder can use a reaction and 1 charge to push a successful attacker 15'; the shield regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Resistant Armor: Infused armor gives +1 Armor Class and resistance to a chosen damage type
Restorative Reagents: Can use alchemist's supplies to cast Lesser Restoration 3 times per long rest, and elixirs give 2d6+3 temporary hit points
Returning Weapon: Infused thrown weapon gives +1 attack and damage and returns after being thrown
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the artificer spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 14 available vs. 23 allocated
